segmentosSRT.text: In Association with Shanghai Film Studios
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text:
Executive Producers:
Kow Fuhong and Christopher Tseng
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text: Script: Yu Hua and Lu Wei
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text: Not one lucky toss all night.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text: Master Fugui, you're out of the game.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text: We'll formalize the transfer in a few days...
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text: And the debt is hereby settled.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text: troops for both sides are everywhere.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text:
If you don't fight the Reds,
you fight the KMT.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text:
But who will look after my wife,
my kids, my old mother?
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text: Forget it. Try to save your own skin.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text:
if I weren't looking for my brother,
I wouldn't be wearing this uniform.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text: Better to wait and become a POW.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text: We're off to the next house.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text: Youqing's not going to any stupid show.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segmentosSRT.text: The Red Guards are in control!
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_02
